5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“Whoever prays six Rak’ah after the Maghrib and does not say anything bad in between them, will have a reward equal to the worship of twelve years.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي السِّتِّ رَكَعَاتٍ بَعْدَ الْمَغْرِبِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the six Rak’ah after the Maghrib
